A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Entertaining\, but what they do with the old characters ( Han\, Luke\, Leia) leaves a lot to be desired. I don’t like the direction the franchise is going. Easily could have made Luke a modern Yoda or something. But we are killing off the characters that MADE the franchise in ways that are borderline disrespectful! I can see Hans death to develop kylos character but I don’t understand Luke’s at all especially the way he went. Not a great movie
